snippet.title: Christmas content update, spend this holiday with Mita.
snippet.description:
Merry Christmas to all our players! In celebration of Christmas, we've prepared some special Christmas-themed content for you. Spend this Christmas with Mita!
During the Christmas event period (December 21 to January 7), log in to the game to receive Mita's Christmas outfit. Plus, we've created a brand new mini-game for you to ice skate with Mita!
Demo Link:https://store.steampowered.com/app/2527500/_MiSide/
